content: introducing the absolute cutest scarflets around this delightful blend of bandana and mini scarf is the most versatile gem in your wardrobe offering a sprinkle of cowgirl flair and a touch of audrey hepburn elegance making it effortlessly fabulous the best part - simply bind off this customizable isosceles cutie when you ve reached your perfect size want a slightly larger kerchief voilà you ve got a charming babushka feeling ambitious go for a fullscale shawl written in two different stitch patterns this little treasure is all about your creative whims so choose your adventure and make it your own
